subject: Football
Restoration and Rehabilitation
lead_paragraph: After winning their final six games last season, the Miami Dolphins are 1-6 this season, tied for the worst record in the N.F.L., and Coach Nick Saban is taking heat.
snippet: After winning their final six games last season, the Miami Dolphins are 1-6 this season, tied for the worst record in the N.F.L., and Coach Nick Saban is taking heat.
